about_the_game:
You are the last surviving keeper, Tasked with the recovery of the relics dropped by your fellow fallen keepers.

Explore a fully destructible dark fantasy post apocalypse world, filled with challenges and difficulties that you must overcome and grow to achieve your goals.

With help from your own relic which allows you to absorb the power of defeated foes.
As well as the ability to zoom in all the way on a target area materializing at a smaller size.
─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Destructible World:
The game takes place 800 years after the apocalypses, in a world that is slightly different from ours "less boring".

The Final Keeper enables unlimited destruction and building of blocks, we have 6 sizes of blocks, ranging from typical size at scale 1, to a microscopic size at scale 6, the smallest placeable block is 32000 times smaller than the biggest block.

Unlimited means you can theoretically keep placing micro blocks until you crash the game!
─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
The Final Keeper has a large focus on itemization, bossing, and RPG mechanics:

  • Itemization:
    Every mob in the world has a chance to drop an item besides their normal loot table.

    Every mob you kill will become a spawnable mob type in the underworld, allowing you to farm them deterministically.
    But don't stay in the underworld too long as things will get nightmarishly worse the longer you stay.

    Farmed loot from the underworld includes bosses which drop their own unique items with variable modifiers.

    Dropped items will be generated with various algorithms and loot tables to make sure that every item is unique in its own way.

  • Bossing:
    On your journey, you will encounter very challenging and rewarding bosses that will put your skills to the test.

    The Final Keeper has no difficulty options, we strongly believe in making a game that is fun to play, Enjoying the game is mandatory,
    progressing further in it however... is entirely optional and will depend on your skill and gear!

  • RPG mechanics:
    The power gained from killing mobs comes in the form of XP, There are currently 30 levels in the game.
    Each level up will offer you an ultimatum between 2 unique character upgrades, choosing one will lock the other one, adding impact to every choice you make and enforcing build diversity.
    On the other hand you can play multiple characters within one world, such as having separate bossing and farming builds.

    Each mob will resist certain types of damage and be weaker to others, encouraging the player to have multiple loadouts of gear.
    And putting the extra gear you get from looting to good use.
─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
There is a lot more waiting for you in the forgotten world of The Final Keeper!

The Final Keeper is being developed by an entirely independent indie studio, and is using a funding campaign to support the development of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3300X / Intel Core i3-10100.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 / AMD RX 580.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required, 1080p 60FPS with quality upscaling.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X / Intel Core i5-12400.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3070 / AMD RX 6700XT.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required, 1440p 80FPS No Upscaling, Third party performance monitoring tools may cause crashes.
